Text:
If you're not sure what this does; this will allow you to boot your PS2 game up giving you the option to play in PAL, or NTSC, and if needed a fix for the picture Y position if you can only see half the screen. You will get this screen at start up:

http://bayimg.com/EAhOMAaEn

To get this, make sure to tick the MAKE PN SELECTOR box when patching the elf, or image, PN meaning PAL/NTSC. So if you have come across a PS2 iso that was in PAL, but you can only play NTSC, or vice versa, now you can play either one after patching the file, very neat little program.
